text: Shlesinger is a surname derived from Schlesien, the German name for Silesia. Notable people with this surname include: * Bernard Shlesinger (born 1960), American bishop * Iliza Shlesinger (born 1983), American comedian * Michael F. Shlesinger (born 1948), American physicist * Miriam Shlesinger (1947-2012), US-Israeli linguist ==See also== * Schlesinger * Schlessinger * Slesinger
title: Shlesinger
